answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!The symptoms can be due to anemia, hypoglycemia, diabetes, hypothyroidism, GERD and acidity. I think you should discuss these possibilities with your doctor. It is difficult to comment beyond this without examining. A comprehensive investigation is required keeping all the points in mind.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: I have been feeling all this symptoms (dizziness, nausea, fetigue, headache, light headed, weakness, loss off appetite) for about 4 or 5 days, blood presure is normal, urinary output is normal too, don't know what to do. Please help me and give me some hints of what it could be, dont have a medical insuranse.
title: been feeling dizzy, nauseous, light headache, fetigue
